CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 一生；终身；有生之年；使用寿命；有效期；（某物的）存在期，寿命；使用期限；长期；预期使用年限；<核>（离子、亚原子粒子的）寿期；<口>很长的一段时间

word_group.brief_definition: 终生难遇的；一生只有一回的
终身雇佣；终身职业；终身工作
终生所得；一生的收入；终身所得

bilingual.source: Many bamboo species only flower once in a lifetime.
bilingual.target: 许多竹子种类一生只开一次花。

bilingual.source: My grandmother has seen a lot of changes during her lifetime.
bilingual.target: 我的祖母在她的一生中见证了许多变化。
真正的友谊可以持续一生。

bilingual.source: This opportunity comes once in a lifetime.
bilingual.target: 这样的机会一生只有一次。

bilingual.source: He made friends that would last a lifetime.
bilingual.target: 他结交了可以维持一生的朋友。

bilingual.source: He spent his lifetime working on that novel.
bilingual.target: 他用一生的时间在写那部小说。

bilingual.source: Some animals procreate only once in their lifetime.
bilingual.target: 有些动物一生只生育一次。

bilingual.source: The memories of that trip will last a lifetime.
bilingual.target: 那次旅行的记忆将会持续一生。

bilingual.source: She has read over a thousand books in her lifetime.
bilingual.target: 她一生中读过超过一千本书。

bilingual.source: This friendship is worth cherishing for a lifetime.
bilingual.target: 这份情谊值得我们珍惜一生。

yingyinNormal.en: And the benefits that children get out of early enrichment can pay off for a lifetime.
yingyinNormal.zh: 孩子在早期教育中获得好处对一生都有益。

yingyinNormal.en: But after a lifetime of such pursuits, I ask, what truly is logic? Who decides reason?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是在一生的追求后，我问我自己，什么才是真正的逻辑？谁来决定原因？

yingyinNormal.en: Indentations on the temples suggest he habitually wears glasses. Frown lines suggest a lifetime of peering.
yingyinNormal.zh: 太阳穴的凹陷说明他通常戴眼镜。眉间纹说明他一生都在用力看。

yingyinNormal.en: In your lifetime, you will face millions of decisions. The quality of your decisions will determine the quality of your life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在你的一生中你将面对百万个决定。你决定的质量将影响你的生活质量。

yingyinNormal.en: Phoebe and Mike are perfect for each other. And I know I speak for everyone here when I wish them a lifetime of happiness.
yingyinNormal.zh: 菲比和迈克是完美的一对儿。我相信在场的每一个人都会和我一样祝愿他们一生幸福。

yingyinNormal.en: I didn't start out with principles. I acquired them over a lifetime of experiences. Mostly, from making mistakes and reflecting on them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 法则不是一开始就有的。是通过一生的经验积累来的。多数是从错误和思考错误中来的。

yingyinNormal.en: When I think of the love that these two givers and receivers share, I can not help but envy the lifetime ahead of having and loving and giving and…
yingyinNormal.zh: 当我想到这两位付出者和接受者所分享的爱，我禁不住嫉妒之后一生的拥有和爱和付出…

yingyinNormal.en: You and I have spent our whole lifetime... You don't give a shit about those men. You needed the bombing to shore up the election, to prop up your weakness in the ranks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你和我都为此奋斗一生了……你根本不在乎他们。你要利用这场爆炸袭击事件赢得选民的支持，巩固地位。

yingyinNormal.en: But if you've got an appetite for the very best things that life has to offer, this is the destination for you. There's enough to feast on here for a lifetime!
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果您想享受最优质的生活品味，纽约绝对是适合您的旅游胜地，一生人总要来一次，享受这里丰盛和精彩的生活！

yingyinNormal.en: Over the course of my lifetime, the most valuable things I've learned were the results of mistakes I reflected on to help form principles so I wouldn't make the same mistakes again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在我的一生中，我学到的最宝贵的事是，我在犯错后思考的结果帮助形成我的法则，以免犯同样的错误。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe your lifetime. I went to space.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对你可能是的，反正我是去过太空了。

yingyinNormal.en: You know? This is a once-in-a-lifetime deal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这可是千载难逢的好机会。

yingyinNormal.en: He's right. A minute on the lips, a lifetime on the hips.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他说得对，嘴上一时享受，臀上一世肥肉。

yingyinNormal.en: Do we break up? Do we sign on for a lifetime of mediocre sex?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们是该分手吗？还是过一辈子平淡无奇的床第生活？

yingyinNormal.en: I know. As far as science goes, this is the adventure of a lifetime.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道，不管科学研究得如何，这可是百年不遇的经历啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Sheldon, I know this isn't easy, but you'll have a whole lifetime to practice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿，我知道这很不容易，但你会有一辈子来慢慢练习。

yingyinNormal.en: How is it you know this place so well? A lifetime ago, I, too, sought the stones.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你怎么如此熟悉这里？上一世我也想找无限宝石。

yingyinNormal.en: So, you want me to just give you my secrets. Secrets I've spent a lifetime learning.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以，你要我…把我的秘诀交给你，我花了一辈子学习的秘诀。

yingyinNormal.en: It is not the first time that a president has been shot in my lifetime or in many of yours.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这不是我国总统第一次遇刺，我和很多人此前都曾经历过。

yingyinNormal.en: The scientific opportunity of a lifetime presents itself and my best friend says "Don't go."
yingyinNormal.zh: 难得的科学机遇就在眼前，我最好的朋友却让我不要去。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: To be fair, the FSA says it is not telling people to cut out roast foods entirely, but to reduce their <highlight>lifetime</highlight> intake.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公平地说，食品标准局表示，它并不是告诉人们完全停止烧烤食物，而是减少他们一生的摄入量。

examination_example.sentence: Shakespeare's <highlight>lifetime</highlight> was coincident with a period of extraordinary activity and achievement in the drama.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 莎士比亚的一生与戏剧的非凡活动和成就时期相吻合。

examination_example.sentence: To limit the number of telescopes on Mauna Kea, old ones will be removed at the end of their <highlight>lifetimes</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了限制莫纳克亚山上望远镜的数量，旧的望远镜将在寿命结束时被移除。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the duration of a person's life

examination_example.sentence: After a <highlight>lifetime</highlight> of moving within the circles of power, he was unable to break with authority.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他一生都在权力的圈子里转来转去，无法脱离权威。

examination_example.sentence: In his <highlight>lifetime</highlight>, Marconi foresaw the development of television and the fax machine, GPS, radar, and the portable hand-held telephone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Marconi在有生之年预见到了电视、传真机、GPS、雷达和便携式手持电话的发展。

examination_example.sentence: Many adults would consider the trips the adventure of a <highlight>lifetime</highlight> treks in Bombe, a sports tour to Barbados.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多成年人会认为这次旅行是一生中在Bombe的一次冒险旅行，一次去巴巴多斯的体育旅行。

sense_info_list.en: used to express the view that a period is very long

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: the duration of a person's life

examination_example.sentence: Americans are less doubtful when it comes to politics: 73% expect to see a female president in their <highlight>lifetime</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国人对未来政坛的预期分歧更小，73%的人认为在有生之年能看到女总统上台。

examination_example.sentence: In his <highlight>lifetime</highlight>, Creme, ever confident, could see beyond his short domination in the kitchen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在他的生命中，自信的 Creme 可以看到他短暂的厨房统治时期之后。

examination_example.sentence: In his short <highlight>lifetime</highlight>, which ended exactly 184 years ago today, he would forever revolutionize French gourmet food (美食) , write best-selling cook books and think up magical dishes for royals and other important people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在他短暂的一生中(距今184年前才结束)，他将永远改变法国的美食，写最畅销的烹饪书，并为皇室成员和其他重要人物制作神奇的菜肴。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: I come to you to ask you to reconsider my <highlight>lifetime</highlight> ban from the hotel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我来是想请你重新考虑我被终身禁止入住酒店的决定。

examination_example.sentence: It would take a <highlight>lifetime</highlight> to see everything.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 要看所有的东西需要一辈子的时间。

examination_example.sentence: Working this way for one year was painful enough, let alone a <highlight>lifetime</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样工作一年已经够痛苦的了，更不用说一辈子了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: According to the official records, only one painting was sold during Van Gogh’s <highlight>lifetime</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据官方记录，梵高生前只卖出了一幅画。

examination_example.sentence: It made Xu very famous during his <highlight>lifetime</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这使徐在生前非常有名。

examination_example.sentence: All jazz lovers should come to the Montreal International Jazz Festival at least once in a <highlight>lifetime</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所有的爵士乐爱好者一生中至少应该来一次蒙特利尔国际爵士音乐节。
